1.3.1.name: wordpress/simply-youtube
1.3.1.description:
The Simply Youtube plugin provides you a simple design and experience for youtube channel in your sidebar. It will show the video thumbnail with customized frames and player will pop up when your visitors click the thumbnail. This plugin is using prettyPhoto for video player.

Features:

  • Custom thumbnail size. You can set the size of your own.
  • Custom frames.
  • Video player popping up and will let your visitor to stay on your site.
  • Complete with video title, description and stat.
